activities: Airlines and travel agents provide ARC with personal information about airline passengers for the purposes of providing settlement and other services as agreed to in the contracts between ARC and the airlines and ARC and the travel agencies.  In this context, ARC is the data processor.  Also, ARC directly receives personal information pertaining to and provided by representatives at airlines and representatives and owners of travel agencies for the purpose of establishing and maintaining the business relationship with those entities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online, off-line and manually processed customer data
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
